AttrDef.name: boundary
AttrDef.desc: The user-selected system boundary for all fields in an Analysis

AttrDef.name: leak_rate
AttrDef.desc: Fraction of gas streams leaked to environment

AttrDef.name: perc_sequestration_credit
AttrDef.desc: Percentage of sequestration credit assigned to the oilfield

AttrDef.name: fraction_elec_onsite
AttrDef.desc: Fraction of required electricity generated onsite

AttrDef.name: fraction_water_reinjected
AttrDef.desc: Fraction of water produced that is reinjected

AttrDef.name: fraction_steam_cogen
AttrDef.desc: Fraction of steam generation via co-generation

AttrDef.name: fraction_steam_solar
AttrDef.desc: Fraction of steam generation via solar thermal

AttrDef.name: gas_pressure_after_boosting
AttrDef.desc: Separator gas outlet pressure after boosting compressors

Option.desc: Dehydration then direct injection of sour CO2-rich stream
Dehydrator + Compressor + Membrane + Amine Process + Demethanizer

AttrDef.name: common_gas_process_choice
AttrDef.desc: Processes common to all gas pathways

AttrDef.name: FOR
AttrDef.desc: Ratio of flaring to oil production

AttrDef.name: frac_transport_tanker
AttrDef.desc: fraction of product transported by ocean tanker

AttrDef.name: frac_transport_barge
AttrDef.desc: fraction of product transported by barge

AttrDef.name: frac_transport_pipeline
AttrDef.desc: fraction of product transported by pipeline

AttrDef.name: frac_transport_rail
AttrDef.desc: fraction of product transported by rail

AttrDef.name: frac_transport_truck
AttrDef.desc: fraction of product transported by truck

AttrDef.name: ocean_tanker_size
AttrDef.desc: The size of ocean tanker in unit of tonne

Option.desc: Low intensity development and low oxidation
Moderate intensity development and moderate oxidation
High intensity development and high oxidation

AttrDef.name: number_wells_dry
AttrDef.desc: Number of dry wells drilled per field found

AttrDef.name: number_wells_exploratory
AttrDef.desc: Number of exploratory/scientific wells drilled after field discovery

AttrDef.name: REC_fracturing_flowback
AttrDef.desc: Fracturing flowback captured with reduced emissons completions?

AttrDef.name: number_well_workovers
AttrDef.desc: Workovers needed over lifetime of well

AttrDef.name: field_production_lifetime
AttrDef.desc: Estimated field lifetime at current production rates

AttrDef.name: steam_quality_after_blowdown
AttrDef.desc: Desired steam quality after blowdown and recycle (if any)

AttrDef.name: friction_loss_steam_distr
AttrDef.desc: Frictional losses in steam distribution and injection lines

AttrDef.name: eta_air_blower_OTSG
AttrDef.desc: Air blower energy consumption for OTSG

AttrDef.name: eta_air_blower_HRSG
AttrDef.desc: Air blower energy consumption for HRSG

AttrDef.name: eta_air_blower_solar
AttrDef.desc: Air blower energy consumption for solar Thermal

AttrDef.name: NG_fuel_share_OTSG_produced
AttrDef.desc: Fraction produced gas of OTSG gaseous fuels share

AttrDef.name: NG_fuel_share_HRSG_produced
AttrDef.desc: Fraction product gas of GT fuel input type

AttrDef.name: O2_excess_OTSG
AttrDef.desc: OTSG excess air in combustion, unit=mol O2 real/mol O2 stoichiometric

AttrDef.name: OTSG_exhaust_temp_outlet_before_economizer
AttrDef.desc: OTSG outlet exhaust temperature before economizer

AttrDef.name: eta_blowdown_heat_rec_OTSG
AttrDef.desc: OTSG heat recovery efficiency from blowdown rejected (for steam quality in excess of 80%)

AttrDef.name: eta_blowdown_heat_rec_HRSG
AttrDef.desc: HRSG heat recovery efficiency from blowdown rejected (for steam quality in excess of 80%)

AttrDef.name: eta_economizer_heat_rec_OTSG
AttrDef.desc: OTSG economizer recovery efficiency from exhaust

AttrDef.name: eta_preheater_heat_rec_OTSG
AttrDef.desc: OTSG preheater recovery efficiency from exhaust

AttrDef.name: eta_economizer_heat_rec_HRSG
AttrDef.desc: HRSG economizer recovery efficiency from exhaust

AttrDef.name: eta_preheater_heat_rec_HRSG
AttrDef.desc: HRSG preheater recovery efficiency from exhaust

AttrDef.name: OTSG_frac_import_gas
AttrDef.desc: OTSG gaseous fuels share for natural gas

AttrDef.name: OTSG_frac_prod_gas
AttrDef.desc: OTSG gaseous fuels share for produced gas

AttrDef.name: HRSG_frac_import_gas
AttrDef.desc: HRSG gaseous fuels share for natural gas

AttrDef.name: HRSG_frac_prod_gas
AttrDef.desc: HRSG gaseous fuels share for produced gas

AttrDef.name: duct_firing_inlet_temp
AttrDef.desc: HRSG inlet temperture when duct firing is on

AttrDef.name: HRSG_exhaust_temp_outlet_before_economizer
AttrDef.desc: HRSG outlet exhaust temperature before economizer

AttrDef.name: surface_piping_leakage
AttrDef.desc: Surface piping leakage for venting kg CH4/d

AttrDef.name: natural_gas_to_liquefaction_frac
AttrDef.desc: Fraction of natural gas to liquefaction

AttrDef.name: frac_CO2_breakthrough
AttrDef.desc: Fraction of CO2 breaking through to producers

AttrDef.name: GOR_cutoff
AttrDef.desc: GOR cutoff used for define the oil field and gas field

AttrDef.name: frac_wells_with_plunger
AttrDef.desc: Fraction of wells with plunger liquids unloadings

AttrDef.name: frac_wells_with_non_plunger
AttrDef.desc: Fraction of wells with non-plunger liquids unloadings

AttrDef.name: workovers_per_well
AttrDef.desc: Workovers needed over lifetime of well

AttrDef.name: is_REC
AttrDef.desc: Fracturing flowback captured with reduced emissons completions?

AttrDef.name: press_pump
AttrDef.desc: Water reinjection pump characteristics Suction pressure

AttrDef.name: eta_pump
AttrDef.desc: Water reinjection pump characteristics Pump efficiency

AttrDef.name: CH4_loss_rate
AttrDef.desc: Fugitive emissions rates from Baray et al. 2018. https://doi.org/10.5194/acp-18-7361-2018. Data from Table 2. Data collected in tonnes of CH4 per hour from each project

AttrDef.name: water_content_oil_emulsion
AttrDef.desc: Entrained water as a fraction of oil emulsion (weight percentage)

AttrDef.name: fraction_disp_water_subsurface
AttrDef.desc: Fraction of excess water disposed in sub-surface

AttrDef.name: fraction_disp_water_surface
AttrDef.desc: Fraction of excess water disposed in surface waters

AttrDef.name: makeup_water_treatment_table
AttrDef.desc: is makeup water treatment same as produced water treatment

AttrDef.name: steam_quality_after_blowdown
AttrDef.desc: desired steam quality after blowdown and recycle (if any)

AttrDef.name: steam_quality_after_blowdown
AttrDef.desc: Desired steam quality after blowdown and recycle (if any)

AttrDef.name: friction_loss_stream_distr
AttrDef.desc: Frictional losses in steam distribution and injection lines

AttrDef.desc: Air blower energy consumption for OTSG

AttrDef.name: eta_air_blower_HRSG
AttrDef.desc: Air blower energy consumption for HRSG

AttrDef.name: eta_air_blower_solar
AttrDef.desc: Air blower energy consumption for solar Thermal

AttrDef.name: before_diluent_temp
AttrDef.desc: Standard temperature before dilution (for calculating volume at standard temperature)

AttrDef.name: before_diluent_press
AttrDef.desc: Standard pressure before dilution (for calculating volume at standard temperature)

AttrDef.name: fraction_diluent
AttrDef.desc: Volume fraction of diluent in diluted crude

AttrDef.name: air_cooler_delta_T
AttrDef.desc: gas dehydration air cooler delta T, air side

AttrDef.name: air_cooler_press_drop
AttrDef.desc: gas dehydration air cooler pressure drop

AttrDef.name: air_cooler_fan_eff
AttrDef.desc: gas dehydration air cooler fan efficiency

AttrDef.desc: gas dehydration air cooler speed reducer efficiency

AttrDef.name: site_fugitive_intercept
AttrDef.desc: Deterministic coefficients used to calculate site fugitive emissions

AttrDef.name: site_fugitive_slope
AttrDef.desc: Deterministic coefficients used to calculate site fugitive emissions

AttrDef.name: eta_reboiler
AttrDef.desc: AGR reboiler Gas-fired heater fuel use

AttrDef.name: air_cooler_delta_T
AttrDef.desc: AGR air cooler delta T, air side

AttrDef.name: air_cooler_speed_reducer_eff
AttrDef.desc: AGR air cooler speed reducer efficiency

AttrDef.name: methane_to_LPG_ratio
AttrDef.desc: methane to ethane NGL composition molar ratio at NGL product stream

AttrDef.name: air_cooler_delta_T
AttrDef.desc: AGR air cooler delta T, air side

AttrDef.name: air_cooler_speed_reducer_eff
AttrDef.desc: AGR air cooler speed reducer efficiency

AttrDef.name: eta_compressor
AttrDef.desc: Gas lifting compressor parameters (1-5 stages) - compressor efficiency

AttrDef.name: air_separation_energy_intensity
AttrDef.desc: Air separation unit electricity consumption (cryogenic N2 gas production)

AttrDef.name: impurity_CH4_in_CO2
AttrDef.desc: Impurity CH4 in CO2 from natural source domes

AttrDef.name: impurity_N2_in_CO2
AttrDef.desc: Impurity N2 in CO2 from CO2 capture plants

AttrDef.name: gas_to_storage_frac
AttrDef.desc: fraction of gas going into long-term storage

AttrDef.name: transmission_sys_discharge
AttrDef.desc: transmission system discharge pressure at distribution system hookup

AttrDef.name: discharge_press
AttrDef.desc: Discharge pressure for gas storage compressor

AttrDef.name: water_production_frac
AttrDef.desc: fraction of water production rate from total gas rate

AttrDef.name: discharge_press
AttrDef.desc: Discharge pressure for gas post storage compressor

AttrDef.name: frac_loss_enduse
AttrDef.desc: Loss fraction at end use appliance or equipment
